Frequently Asked Questions

How do I add a new device?

Navigate to the "My Devices" page from the sidebar and click the "Add New Device" button. You will be guided through a multi-step process.

What does "Mark as Lost" do?

"Mark as Lost" is a high-priority security action. It enables advanced tracking, locks the device, and displays a custom message on the lock screen.

How accurate is the location tracking?

Location accuracy depends on the device's GPS signal, Wi-Fi network availability, and cellular data. In optimal conditions, it can be accurate within a few meters.
